item.title: R markdown posting
item.description: The following post is written by R markdown. Getting used to markdown language. R markdown is basically better markdown platform with more advanced pugins. With R studio, you can use useful packages by one click. 이하 포스팅은 R 마크다운으로 편집되었다. 마크다운 문법에 적응중인데 R Studio를 이용하면 기존 마크다운에 없는 기능을 블로그에 바로 적용가능

item.title: About 소개
item.description: I’m Lvmb. I am based and redpilled gamer, and also humble zoomer. I am from Korea somewhere. Yes, I do speak Korean. That’s why you see this hipster languages all around. And no, I have no opinion on KPOP and I am not going to write my words in Korean and English at every single same time. I will shitpost different subjects in different languages. So bring your google translator, stay with me, or die. This is my website, which in MIT cucking fking license. Do you see the copyright sign at the bottom? That was not my intention to

item.title: Library 책장
item.description: 독서 리스트 This is a list of the books in my personal library. If you have any questions or want me to review any of them, email me (incidentalian@gmail.com). I haven’t read every book here, nor do I own all the books I’ve read or like. I also don’t necessarily like all the books I own.
